channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Voice of America director says Trump officials are illegally ousting him
item.description: A judge is demanding answers about the international broadcaster's future from Trump official Kari Lake.

item.title: Statue of French General Accused of Torture Divides His Hometown
